title: Waldorf salad with walnut oil vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2 red apples, cored and diced', '2 Granny Smith apples, cored and diced', '4 celery stalks, diced', '80g raisins', '120g toasted walnuts (see note)', '2 tablespoons walnut oil', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper']
